category_subtitle: Milan Cortina 2026 — Let the Games Begin!

rounds.pro_tip: SNOW TEXTURE: Real snow has complex crystalline structure with subtle blue shadows. AI snow often looks like smooth white paint or cotton.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — Olympic rings monument in snowy mountain setting (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: GEOMETRIC PRECISION: The Olympic rings have exact proportions. AI often distorts them — uneven ring sizes, wrong overlap order, or incorrect colors.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic Olympic rings sculpture in snowy Italian Alps, Dolomites background, sunset light, winter atmosphere'

rounds.pro_tip: ICE SURFACE: Real ice has natural scratches, embedded bubbles, and varied translucency. AI ice often looks like frosted glass with unrealistic clarity.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — figure skater mid-spin on Olympic ice (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: BODY PROPORTIONS: Real athletes have natural body proportions even in dynamic poses. AI often elongates limbs, twists joints impossibly, or creates anatomical errors.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic figure skater mid-spin on ice rink, sparkly costume, ice spray, arena lights, Olympic rings visible'

rounds.pro_tip: MOUNTAIN DETAIL: Real mountain photos show geological strata, erosion patterns, and varied vegetation. AI mountains are often too smooth or repetitively textured.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — ski jumper in mid-air against blue sky (DALL-E 3)
rounds.pro_tip: EQUIPMENT DETAILS: Real ski equipment has brand logos, specific bindings, and wear marks. AI gear tends to have blurry or invented brand names and physically impossible mechanisms.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic ski jumper in mid-air, blue sky, snowy mountain backdrop, Olympic venue, action shot, telephoto lens'

rounds.pro_tip: LIGHTING CONSISTENCY: In real photos, all surfaces respond to the same light source. AI sometimes lights different parts of the scene from conflicting angles.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — Olympic torch bearer running through Italian village (Flux)
rounds.pro_tip: FIRE INTERACTION: Real torch flames interact with the runner's movement — trailing, flickering. AI flames often sit static on the torch like a sticker.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic Olympic torch bearer running through charming Italian village street, crowds cheering, evening light, torch flame bright'

rounds.pro_tip: ATMOSPHERIC PERSPECTIVE: In real landscape photos, distant objects appear hazier and bluer due to atmosphere. AI sometimes renders distant mountains as sharp as foreground objects.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated — Olympic medal ceremony podium with flags (Midjourney)
rounds.pro_tip: FLAGS & SYMBOLS: Real flags have correct proportions, colors, and designs. AI frequently generates flags with wrong stripe counts, invented symbols, or impossible folds.
rounds._note: Generate: 'photorealistic Olympic medal ceremony, three athletes on podium, national flags behind, gold silver bronze medals, indoor arena'
